Class: PatAPI

PatAPI

new PatAPI(key, versionopt)

Port Authority API object for making API calls
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
key string developer API key
version string <optional>
 API version (default 'v1')
Source:
  • index.js, line 19

Methods

get(method, paramsopt, callback)

GET request to the PAT API server
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
method string appropriate API call as defined by PAT (ex: 'getvehicles')
params object <optional>
 object of query string parameters (ex: {rt: '28x', pid: 'abc123'})
callback patapi~PatAPI#patCallback callback function with response
Source:
  • index.js, line 29
